definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 25:23 people, poet. and chiefly late;—´[[ל]] abs. Ge 25:23, Ge 25:23, Pr 14:28, [[לְאוֹם]] Pr 11:26; sf. [[לְאוּמִּי]] Is 51:4; pl. [[לְאֻמִּים]] Ge 25:23 + 28 t.; [[לְאוּמִים]] Is 55:4; —people, both of Isr. and of Edom, Ge 25:23, Ge 25:23, Ge 25:23 (J; Jacob and Esau; ‖[[גּוֹי]]); elsewhere of Isr. only Is 51:4 (sg. ‖[[עַם]]); usu. pl. of other peoples:—´[[שְׁאוֹן ל]] Is 17:12 (‖[[הֲמוֹן עמים]], cf. v:Is 17:13; ‖[[גּוֹיִם]] Is 34:1, Is 43:9, Ps 2:1, Ps 44:3, Ps 44:15, Ps 105:44, Ps 149:7, cf. Is 55:4, Is 55:4 ([[גּוֹי]] in v:Is 55:5); ‖[[עַמִּים]] Ge 27:29 (J), Hb Hab 2:13, Je 51:58, Ps 47:4, Ps 57:10, Ps 67:5, Ps 67:5, Ps 108:4, Pr 24:24; further Is 41:1, Is 49:1 (both ‖[[אִיִּים]]), Is 43:4 (‖[[אָדָם]]), Is 60:2 (‖[[אֶרֶץ]]), Ps 9:9 (‖[[תֵּבֵל]]), Ps 148:11 (‖[[מַלְכֵי]] [[אֶרֶץ]], etc.); [[עֲדַת לְאֻמִּים]] Ps 7:8, ´[[הֲמוֹן ל]] Ps 65:8; of any and all peoples Pr 14:34; sg. Indef. = people in gen., as making public opinion, Pr 11:26 (coll., c. pl. vb.); = population, as subjects of prince Pr 14:28 (‖[[עַם]]).
